item.title: Hearty Oatmeal
item.description: If your Oatmeal isn‚Äôt Hearty Breakfast Oatmeal‚Ä¶ Is it even Oatmeal? ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 5 min üç≥Cook time: 10 min üçΩÔ∏è Serving: 1 hearty serving Ingredients 1/2 cup Large Flake Oats (no partially cooked quick-oats allowed!) Almonds Pecans 1 Tbsp Roasted Flax Seed 1 Tbsp Hemp Hearts Cranberries (adjust amount to preference) 1/2 Banana (mashed) 1 cup Milk (3.25% if possible) Cinnamon (adjust amount to preference) 1 Egg ON Vanilla Ice Cream Protein Powder (optional) Directions Chop or mash nuts and fruit.

item.title: Protein Oat Cake
item.description: Macros Calories: 464 Protein: 44g Carbs: 56g Fat: 7g Ingredients 60g oats 1 egg 1/2 tsp of baking powder 1/2 tsp of vanilla extract 100ml of almond milk or milk of choice 1 banana 1 cup of whey protein Instructions Blend the oats to make flour. Add the egg, baking powder, vanilla extract, milk and banana. Blend. Add one cup of whey protein. Blend again. Add to a greased baking dish and microwave for 2.
